description:
The Occult Research Club takes over cleaning the pool to thank the student council for their help with Kokabiel, and Issei runs into a lot of trouble.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu Desu! Mizugi Desu! Pinch Desu!
Summer! Bathing Suits! I`m in Trouble!
Été, maillots de bain, et danger !
夏です!水着です!ピンチです!
